self_predictions.prediction_summary: Genadi is confident he will beat Michael Todd, citing his preparation and recovery from injury. He believes his offensive skills are superior to Michael's.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Genadi plans to use his offensive skills to dominate Michael.

Michael Todd.strength: Michael is strong but not on Genadi's level offensively.
Michael Todd.health: Michael has recovered from his injuries and is in good shape.
Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: Genadi previously beat Michael and believes he can do it again.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Genadi believes it's a 50-50 match. Dzeranov must either hook or deadlift to win, but Laletin's hand strength is a significant factor.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Dzeranov needs to avoid outside pulling to have a chance.

Vitalii Laletin.strength: Laletin has a strong hand and is in good shape.
Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: Laletin has been dominant in previous matches.

Georgii Dzeranov.strength: Dzeranov is strong but may struggle with Laletin's hand.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Genadi favors Muratov due to his current shape, though Matyushenko is fast and explosive.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Muratov's surge will be tough for Matyushenko to stop.

Alizhan Muratov.strength: Muratov is in better shape currently.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Genadi believes Levan will win due to his size, hand strength, and ability to adjust strategies. He thinks it will be a war but Levan will prevail.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Levan's versatility and hand strength will be key.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Levan is dominant and has refined his skills.
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Levan has been unbeatable in recent matches.

Jerry Cadorette.strength: Jerry is strong but may struggle with Levan's hand.
Jerry Cadorette.previous_match_summary: Jerry has shown good form recently.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Genadi favors Chikadze due to his strength and current shape.
Genadi thinks Corey will win but it will be a tough battle.

Corey West.previous_match_summary: Corey performed well in his last match.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Genadi favors Morozov but acknowledges Kurdecha could win. He thinks Morozov is currently in better shape.

Alex Kurdecha.strength: Kurdecha is strong but may not be at his peak.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Genadi believes Devon must win, as he wants to be the one to beat Devon first.

Devon Larratt.strength: Devon is strong and must win.
